meaningMnemonic: Under the <radical>moon</radical> beneath a <radical>tree</radical> there is a <radical>hat</radical> filled with <radical>water</radical>. You stare down into the water and decide to stick your <kanji>knee</kanji> in it.
readingMnemonic: Suddenly, in your <kanji>knee</kanji>, you feel <reading>he</reading>at and a <reading>za</reading>p (ひざ)! Your knee is simultaneously burned and electrocuted by the hot water!!
